meta.title: Jason Plays gaming content creator! Join my NMS adventures!
meta.titleKeywords: Jason Plays gaming! join NMS adventures!
meta.description: I am a content creator focusing on No Man's Sky and other games that I am passionate about! Join my gaming live streams!

subtitle: Join me on my adventures!
footerDescription: Feel free to subscribe to the channel and join us in a live stream or two!
